## Node.RemoveChild method

Removes the child node indicated by oldChild from the list of children, and returns it.

```csharp
public Node RemoveChild(Node child)
```

| Parameter | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| child | Node | The old child. |

## Return Value

Returns node
